Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista® IGA Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista® IGM Flex® reagent cartridge
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D and E Immunological Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista IgA and IgM Flex reagent cartridges for quantitative measurement of immunoglobulins A and M using nephelometry on the Dimension Vista System.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test for the quantitative measurement of Immunoglobulin A and Immunoglobulin M in human serum and heparinized plasma by means of nephelometry on the Dimension Vista System to aid in diagnosis of abnormal protein metabolism and immune deficiency.
